name: Softhis
tagline: Nearshore IT developer. Project & team outsourcing
description:
Softhis since 2005 delivers bespoke software implementations: web applications, workflow solutions, e-signature, CRM, ERP, mobile applications and interface design. We are based in Polish "Silicone Valley" - Cracow. Working surrounded by the best startup community in the Central Europe gives us skilled employees, devoted to their tasks and projects.
The Deloitte Technology Fast50 CE focusing fastest growing innovative technology companies, ranked Softhis in 2013 the #1 in Poland and #3 in Central Europe. Softhis works with GEIST (Group for Engineering of Intelligent Systems and Technologies) at the University of Science - Technology. Patron of the Polish Association of Artificial Intelligence and a member of the Chamber of Electronic Economy.
We aspire to be leading software house in Poland, providing innovative IT services to the global market. Our competitive advantage:
highly skilled and experienced staff focused on latest IT technologies
international clients
focused on R&D in cooperation with best Polish universities
affordable price for project & team outsourcing services
over 250 IT projects delivered
